com.emc.storageos.model.vpool

Class VirtualPoolChangeRep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.storageos.model.RelatedResourceRep
      • com.emc.storageos.model.NamedRelatedResourceRep
        • com.emc.storageos.model.vpool.NamedRelatedVirtualPoolRep
          • com.emc.storageos.model.vpool.VirtualPoolChangeRep

  • public class VirtualPoolChangeRep
extends NamedRelatedVirtualPoolRep
    Extends the name related resource to add new fields specifying if the a change to the virtual pool is allowed and the reason if not allowed.
